permafrost.tundra.server.invoke

Class PipelineCaptureProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.server.invoke.AbstractInvokeChainProcessor
      • permafrost.tundra.server.invoke.PipelineCaptureProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.wm.app.b2b.server.invoke.InvokeChainProcessor, com.wm.util.coder.IDataCodable, Startable

    public class PipelineCaptureProcessor
extends AbstractInvokeChainProcessor
implements com.wm.util.coder.IDataCodable
    A service invocation processor that saves input and output pipelines to disk.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  PipelineCaptureProcessor.NamedThreadFactory
      Thread factory that names the returned threads.
      private static class  PipelineCaptureProcessor.SavePipelineToFileRunnable
      A runnable which saves a pipeline to a file.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicLong count
      Atomic counter incremented for each saved pipeline.
      protected static java.lang.String DATE_PATTERN
      The datetime format used in the saved pipeline file names.
      static java.io.File DEFAULT_DIRECTORY
      The default pipeline directory.
      static java.util.regex.Pattern DEFAULT_SERVICE_PATTERN
      The default service pattern: matches all services.
      protected java.io.File directory
      The directory in which the pipelines are saved.
      protected java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executor
      A thread-pool for asynchronously saving pipelines to disk, so that invocation performance is minimally affected.
      protected java.lang.String localhost
      The local host name, used when naming pipeline files.
      protected java.util.regex.Pattern servicePattern
      A regular expression which if matching the invoked service will save the pipeline to disk.
      protected long startTime
      When the capture was started.

      • generatePipelineFilename

        protected java.io.File generatePipelineFilename(java.io.File directory,
                                                java.lang.String serviceName,
                                                java.lang.String startDateTime,
                                                long id,
                                                java.lang.String suffix)
        Returns a new file name for saving a pipeline to.
        Parameters:
        directory - The parent directory for the pipeline files.
        serviceName - The name of the service the pipeline belongs to.
        startDateTime - The formatted start datetime of the service.
        id - The ID of the invocation.
        suffix - A suffix for the file name, such as "input" or "output".
        Returns:
        A file name suitable for saving the pipeline to.
